name: Turf Memories
overview: Turf Memories is a horse racing game for the Super Famicom. The player can raise their own racehorses for competitions, managing their training and entering them into races as they improve. It joins a number of other in-depth horse racing/horse raising simulation games for the system, including the Thoroughbred Breeder, Derby Stallion and Classic Road franchises. It is unrelated to Tecmo's Super Famicom horse racing game Turf Hero, which was released the following month.
